attributes.action: Not require mothers with children aged seven or more to be expected to seek work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have children, working should be a choice, as some mothers see bringing up their children to become responsible teenagers as their work and vocation and this will adversely affect children in single parent families who may need a parent there both psychologically, emotionally and physically.  The family is the bedrock of society and should be supported as such.
